CustomProperties.Tooltip: Table used for building up the navigation menu. Every item needs to have a property for navigation item title and a target screen to navigate to for the menu to work.

Rules.InvariantScript: If(Self.Layout = Layout.Horizontal, Min(250, Self.Width - 50), Min(250, Self.Height - 50))

ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString: If(Self.Layout = Layout.Horizontal, Min(320, Self.Width - 60), Min(320, Self.Height - 60))

CustomProperties.Name: ArrowColor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: //Color code in text (css / hex) to allow use for fill color of arrows.

CustomProperties.Name: FontColor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: //Color code in text (css / hex) to allow use for fill color of font.

CustomProperties.Name: FillColor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: //Color code in text (css / hex) to allow use for fill color of Icon..

CustomProperties.Name: ButtonWidth
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Used to edit the width of the button.

CustomProperties.Name: ButtonHeight
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Used to edit the height of the button.

CustomProperties.Name: IconSize
CustomProperties.Tooltip: //Allows you to change the size of the icon

CustomProperties.Name: Position
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Positioning of the text and icon.

CustomProperties.Name: ArrowType
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Type of icon arrow to use. Insert arrow or chevron.

CustomProperties.Name: FlipArrow
CustomProperties.Tooltip: //flips arrows direction. Insert true or false.

Rules.InvariantScript:
//Positioning of the text and icon. true = Right, false = Left
true

//flips arrows direction. Insert true or false.
true

//You can choose from 2 arrow types. A regular arrow or a chevron. Add "arrow" or "chevron" to indicate which one you want to use. 
"arrow"

ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString:
//Positioning and direction of the arrow icon. true = Right, false = Left
true

Rules.InvariantScript:
If(
    'Icon Button'.Position,
    imgIconCircle.X - Self.Width,
    imgIconCircle.X + imgIconCircle.Width
)

//Color code in text (css / hex) to allow use for fill color of Icon.

"data:image/svg+xml;utf8, " & EncodeUrl(
    "
<svg width='30' height='30' viewBox='0 0 40 40' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>

<path fill-rule='evenodd' clip-rule='evenodd' d='M20 40C31.0457 40 40 31.0457 40 20C40 8.9543 31.0457 0 20 0C8.9543 0 0 8.9543 0 20C0 31.0457 8.9543 40 20 40Z' fill= '" & 'Icon Button'.FillColor & "'/>
</svg>

"
)

If(
    !lblButtonTitle.Visible,
    Parent.Width / 2 - Self.Width/2,
    'Icon Button'.Position,
    Parent.Width - Self.Width*1.5,
    Self.Width*0.5
    
)

Switch(
    'Icon Button'.ArrowType,
    "arrow",
    "data:image/svg+xml;utf8, " & EncodeUrl(
        "
<svg width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
<path fill-rule='evenodd' clip-rule='evenodd' d='M5.41418 12.0001L8.70706 15.293L7.29285 16.7072L2.29285 11.7072V10.293L7.29285 5.29297L8.70706 6.70718L5.41415 10.0001L22 10.0001V12.0001L5.41418 12.0001Z' fill= '" & 'Icon Button'.ArrowColor & "'/>
</svg>
"
    ),
    "chevron",
    "data:image/svg+xml;utf8, " & EncodeUrl(
        "
<svg width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
<path fill-rule='evenodd' clip-rule='evenodd' d='M9.7143 12.0106L15.0911 19.9525L13.4349 21.0737L7.67018 12.5588L7.68182 11.4207L13.6818 2.9374L15.3147 4.09228L9.7143 12.0106Z' fill= '" & 'Icon Button'.ArrowColor & "'/>
</svg>
"
    ) 
    
)

//Positioning of the text and icon. true = Right, false = Left
true

//flips arrows direction. Insert true or false.
true

//You can choose from 2 arrow types. A regular arrow or a chevron. Add "arrow" or "chevron" to indicate which one you want to use. 
"arrow"

ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString:
//Positioning and direction of the arrow icon. true = Right, false = Left
true
